mapper.sql: memID, mcID, merID, mcType, mcCredit, mcBalance, mcEnable
mapper.insert: insert into MemberCard (memID, mcID, merID, mcType, mcCredit, mcBalance, mcEnable) values (#{memid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{mcid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{merid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{mctype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mccredit,jdbcType=REAL}, #{mcbalance,jdbcType=REAL}, #{mcenable,jdbcType=BIT})

insert into MemberCard
memID,
mcID,
merID,
mcType,
mcCredit,
mcBalance,
mcEnable,

mapper.update:
update MemberCard
merID = #{merid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
mcType = #{mctype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mcCredit = #{mccredit,jdbcType=REAL},
mcBalance = #{mcbalance,jdbcType=REAL},
mcEnable = #{mcenable,jdbcType=BIT},
where memID = #{memid,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and mcID = #{mcid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
